name: The Frosty Leaves 寒叶下的薄冰
description: This is a tragedy cause by illegal plant collecting. The main character, Leng Xiaobing, was a normal shop keeper form a grocery store, but ever things changed after she met a strange...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA  GTX 560SE DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
